item.title: Chappell Roan, Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis to Be Honored at SONA Warrior Awards
item.description: Also set to be honored are entertainment lawyer Dina LaPolt, Primary Wave CEO Larry Mestel and nonprofit organization Girls Make Beats.

item.title: Chappell Roan Announces Pop Up Shows in L.A., NY and Kansas City
item.description: The “Pink Pony Club” singer announced the shows just a day after teasing her next single, “The Subway.”

item.title: Chappell Roan Seemingly Teases Release of Long-Awaited Single “The Subway”
item.description: The pop star played the song at multiple festivals last summer but has yet to release a studio version.
